Longleat30.First Lines:
Kyrieleyson haue mercy good lordeCristeleyson we crye now to
                    þe…
Longleat30.Last Lines:
…And teche vs alle þe for to pleseThat deydest for vs
                    chrsteleysonkyrieleyson

HunHM142.First Lines:
Kyrieleyson haue mercy good lordeCristeleyson we crye
                    now to þe…
HunHM142.Last Lines:
…And teche us alle þe for to pleseThat deydest for us
                        christeleyson
HunHM142.Note:
After end, on next line, rubric
                    ‘Kyrieleyson’.
HunHM142.Editions:
Schulz,  Herbert. C. 
             “Middle English Texts from the ‘Bement’ Manuscript.” 
             Huntington Library Quarterly
         3 (1940): 440-65: 460-5.
